title: Length of Longest Fibonacci Subsequence
content: A sequence is fibonacci-like if: for all Given a strictly increasing array of positive integers forming a sequence, find the length of the longest fibonacci-like subsequence of . If one does not exist, return 0. (Recall that a subsequence is derived from another sequence by deleting any number of elements (including none) from , without changing the order of the remaining elements. For example, is a subsequence of .)
